title: Human Body Systems and Interactions

vocab.definition: A group of organs that work together to perform a specific function
The system that moves blood throughout the body
The system that helps you breathe and exchange gases
The system that breaks down food to provide nutrients
The system that controls and coordinates body activities

teachingNotes: Focus on how different body systems work together. Use diagrams to show connections between systems. Discuss how the body maintains itself through system interactions.

sample.question: How do the circulatory and respiratory systems work together?

truefalse.question: The nervous system controls all other body systems.

multiplechoice.question: Which system breaks down food into nutrients?

fillintheblank.question: The ________ system pumps blood throughout your body.

shortanswer.question: What happens when you exercise that shows systems working together?
